thread.title: BRIEF-Shiloh Industries Says Unit Entered Into Two Sale And Purchase Agreements With Brabant Alucast- SEC Filing

title: BRIEF-Shiloh Industries Says Unit Entered Into Two Sale And Purchase Agreements With Brabant Alucast- SEC Filing

organizations.name: brief-shiloh industries says unit entered into two sale
brief-shiloh industries says unit entered into tw

text:
February 7, 2018 / 1:04 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Shiloh Industries Says Unit Entered Into Two Sale And Purchase Agreements With Brabant Alucast- SEC Filing Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Shiloh Industries Inc: 
* SHILOH INDUSTRIES SAYS ON FEB 1, UNIT ENTERED INTO TWO SALE AND PURCHASE AGREEMENTS WITH BRABANT ALUCAST SERVICES - SEC FILING 
* SHILOH INDUSTRIES SAYS SHILOH NETHERLANDS WILL PURCHASE TWO BRABANT ENTITIES FOR AN AGGREGATE PURCHASE PRICE OF EUR 52.9 MILLION - SEC FILING Source text : bit.ly/2C1zQEc Further company coverage:
